Permission.description: A permission associated with the security profile.

ResourceName.description: A resource that a security profile applies tag or hierarchy restrictions to in Amazon Connect.

ApplicationPermission.description: The permissions that the agent is granted on the application.

ApplicationPermissions.description: The permissions that the agent is granted on the application

Namespace.description: Namespace of the application that you want to give access to.

Tag.description: A key-value pair to associate with a resource.

Key.description: The key name of the tag. You can specify a value that is 1 to 128 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

Value.description: The value for the tag. You can specify a value that is 0 to 256 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

AllowedAccessControlTags.description: The list of tags that a security profile uses to restrict access to resources in Amazon Connect.

Description.description: The description of the security profile.

InstanceArn.description: The identifier of the Amazon Connect instance.

Permissions.description: Permissions assigned to the security profile.

SecurityProfileArn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the security profile.

SecurityProfileName.description: The name of the security profile.

TagRestrictedResources.description: The list of resources that a security profile applies tag restrictions to in Amazon Connect.

HierarchyRestrictedResources.description: The list of resources that a security profile applies hierarchy restrictions to in Amazon Connect.

AllowedAccessControlHierarchyGroupId.description: The identifier of the hierarchy group that a security profile uses to restrict access to resources in Amazon Connect.

Applications.description: A list of third-party applications that the security profile will give access to.

Tags.description: The tags used to organize, track, or control access for this resource.

LastModifiedRegion.description: The AWS Region where this resource was last modified.

LastModifiedTime.description: The timestamp when this resource was last modified.
